events.description: Gleyber Torres singles on a sharp line drive to center fielder James Outman.
Aaron Judge grounds into a double play, third baseman Max Muncy to second baseman Miguel Vargas to first baseman Freddie Freeman. Gleyber Torres out at 2nd. Aaron Judge out at 1st. 2 outs
Anthony Rizzo called out on strikes. 3 outs
Mookie Betts homers (14) on a line drive to left field.
